name: Empire Building (DurmanGames)
description:
Empire Building is game where you can build your own empire and destroy other Empires. You can play single player with bots(in development), or you can play with your friends. I think about making online server.

Current functional: basic fighting system, AIs, character customization(name, color), local multiplayer, connect to other people by ip address, basic building system.

In my imagination: Bosses, open world, big empires created by AI, ship building, online multiplayer, advanced building system(like roof of bed), crafting.

Controls:

Move: [w,a,s,d]

Jump: space

Sprint: left shift

Left attack: left mouse button

Right attack: right mouse button

Attack down left: ctrl + left mouse button

Attack down right: ctrl + right mouse button

Building: f(to build you must have resources, in down left corner)

Gmail: durmangames.gamedev@gmail.com

Support: Patreon, YouTube, Instagram.
